snippet.title: Battlejack | Epic RPG card battles!
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD on iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/battlejack/id1064497671?mt=8
DOWNLOAD on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.grandcru.battlejack&hl=en

Collect legendary heroes & battle the evil forces of Chaos in this epic RPG!

Join a Guild to crush Titans in Guild tournaments for special awards with your friends!

FAST PACED, MULTI-LEVELED CARD BATTLE ACTION
- Draw cards to score a total sum of 21! Dare to draw one more at 15?
- Collect Mana to whack opponents with special skills and collect a dream team of heroes to activate powerful COMBO attacks!
- To get the final edge in the battle, spice up your heroes with different Rune sets and upgrades.

AN EPIC JOURNEY
- Embark on an Epic journey through Midgard to free the magic tree Yggdrasil from chaos. Uncover new worlds through more than a hundred story-driven levels.
- Face over 40 bosses in turn-based, action-packed battles and slay the terrifying Chaos Gods!

COLLECT HEROES
- With hundreds of heroes to collect, there’s no limit to the number of different team combinations you can try and match for the optimal combination against each world and Titans.

LEVEL UP AND EVOLVE
- Fuse your heroes to make them even stronger and cooler. With the right ingredients, your starting heroes can become mighty gods of battle.

JOIN GUILDS
- Crush Titans together with your guild.
- Chat and make friends in-game.
- Help your guild mates to level up and gain valuable guild points!

© 2017 NEXON M Inc. and Grand Cru Oy. All Rights Reserved
